creator: Mobi Gamers Studio
descriptionHtml:
Let’s start your crazy cooking adventure and build a burger factory in your town and run your frenzy kitchen like a super chef. These fast food salon games help you to improve your mad cook skills and give you chance to bake delicious hamburgers in your factory kitchen. It’s time to unleash your crazy cooking and surprise the restaurant chefs with your unique talent. Beat the world’s best chefs in a cooking competition and enjoy the cooking kitchen simulation games for girls. Cook triple cheeseburgers & hamburgers and Improve skills to serve hungry customers all over the world.

Practice your techniques in the burger kitchen and improve your management skills. Tap as fast as you can while baking crispy burger recipes and keep your eye on the time. Try all the possible frenzy kitchen appliances available in the cooking salon to improve your abilities. Dash your crazy restaurant chef skills and run your food maker shop successfully like a fast-food salon simulator.

Put on your mad chefs’ apron and start your crazy cooking in the kitchen. Mix well the recipe ingredients in a huge bowl and made the perfect dough for buns. Bake the buns in the oven and pour the vegetables and cheese to make a cheesy hamburger like the top fast-food maker chef. Decorate the burgers and give some extraordinary look before packing in boxes and deliver to supermarket fast food bakery.

Keep making tasty pizza burgers to maintain the supply chain between food factories and food street bakery shops. Cook & supply delicious burgers to your supermarket customers and run your fast food factory like a pro food supply businessman. Do your work as an expert chef and save your time to enhance your time management skills. Choose from a huge selection of recipe ingredients and create your favorite burgers like super cook.

Burger Factory kitchen simulator is a new addictive time-management & restaurant fever game where you can enjoy endless fun as a master chef by making delicious food & tasty cuisines in fast food maker games. Bake spicy hot dog burgers in a bakery salon and take your burger-making business on top with your madness and hard work as a real factory worker.

Features of Burger Factory kitchen simulator :
- Learn multiple burger recipes in this cooking academy game
- Unleash your cooking craze & bake delicious hamburgers
- Enhance your management skills and run your own fast food salon
- Explore multiple game tools to become a crazy cook in real life
- Smooth gameplay helps to improve time management skills by simply drag & drop
- All feature is completely free & offline of this fast-food factory game for girls
descriptionShort: Cook tasty fast food in cooking kitchen & Run a burger factory like a top chef
title: Burger factory kitchen simulator: Fast food maker
